channel.title: João Brogueira de Sousa
channel.description: Recent content on João Brogueira de Sousa

item.title: about
item.author: joao.sousa@novasbe.pt (João Brogueira de Sousa)
item.description: I’m a Research Fellow in Economics at Nova School of Business and Economics, in Carcavelos (Portugal). I obtained a PhD in Economics at the European University Institute. In this website you can find my work in quantitative macroeconomics and finance. You can find most of the code I work with on my github page.

item.title: Research
item.author: joao.sousa@novasbe.pt (João Brogueira de Sousa)
item.description: Working papers A Worker’s Backpack as an Alternative to PAYG Pension Systems (2021 - slides), with Julián Diáz-Saavedra and Ramon Marimon Introducing an Austrian Backpack in Spain (2021, submitted), with Julián Diáz-Saavedra and Ramon Marimon On the Design of a European Unemployment Insurance System (2019, under revision - draft), with Árpád Ábrahám, Ramon Marimon and Lukas Mayr Work in progress Unemployment subsidies and layoff subsidies during the pandemic, with Marta C.
